content: अलकः [अल्-क्वुन्, अलति भूषयति मुखं] {@--1@} A curl, lock of hair, hair in general; ललाटिकाचंदनधूसरालका <ls>Ku. 5. 55</ls>; अस्पृष्टालकवेष्टनौ <ls>R. 1. 42</ls>; <ls n="R.">4. 54</ls>; अलकभंगतां गतः <ls>K. 4</ls>; अलके बालकुंदानुविद्धं <ls>Me. 65</ls> (the word is {%<ab>n.</ab>%} also, as appears from a quotation of <ls>Malli.</ls>: स्वभाववक्राण्यलकानि तासां). {@--2@} Curls on the fore-head. {@--3@} Saffron besmeared on the body. {@--4@} A mad dog (for अलर्क). --का {@--1@} A girl from eight to ten years of age. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the capital of Kubera (situated on a peak of the Himālaya above the peak of Meru, inhabited also by Śiva), and of the lord of the Yakṣas; अलकामतिवाह्यैव <ls>Ku. 6. 37</ls>; विभाति यस्यां ललितालकायां मनोहरा वैश्रवणस्य लक्ष्मीः <ls>Bv. 2. 10</ls>; गंतव्या ते वसतिरलका नाम यक्षेश्वराणां <ls>Me. 7.</ls>
